verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] calling for Russia to be reinstated to the leading group of industrialized nations , now known as the Group of Seven .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: calling] [ARG1: for Russia to be reinstated to the leading group of industrialized nations , now known as the Group of Seven] .
President Donald Trump is calling for Russia to [V: be] reinstated to the leading group of industrialized nations , now known as the Group of Seven .
President Donald Trump is calling for [ARG1: Russia] to be [V: reinstated] [ARG2: to the leading group of industrialized nations , now known as the Group of Seven] .
President Donald Trump is calling for Russia to be reinstated to the [V: leading] [ARG0: group] of industrialized nations , now known as the Group of Seven .
President Donald Trump is calling for Russia to be reinstated to [ARG1: the leading group of industrialized nations] , [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: known] [ARG2: as the Group of Seven] .
